system.description: Tieflings bear the mark of infernal heritage in their appearance and magical abilities. Despite often facing prejudice, many tieflings embrace their dark charisma and innate magical talents.
traits: Hellish Resistance: You have resistance to fire damage.
Infernal Legacy: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip. You can cast Hellish Rebuke once per long rest, and Darkness once per long rest.
Devil's Tongue: Tieflings have a natural gift for persuasion and deception.
